user.title: Set up your Greencell HabuDen EVSE
user.description: The integration will try to discover your EVSE devices over MQTT.

select.title: Select your device
select.description: Multiple Greencell devices were found (total: {count}). Please choose which one you want to configure.

abort.discovery_timeout: No device responded to the discovery request.
abort.invalid_discovery_data: The received discovery data is invalid.
abort.mqtt_subscription_failed: Failed to subscribe to the MQTT topic for discovery.
abort.no_discovery_data: No discovery data received. Ensure the device is online and broadcasting.
abort.mqtt_not_connected: MQTT is not connected. Ensure the MQTT broker is running and configured.
